Title: SimpleScroller
Description:
This is module for DotNetNuke 5.x, to show a simple box with vertically scrolling text inside.

The view and style can be customizable.
HomeWiki:
This is project from CodexStar International.
A simple DNN module to show a scrolling text in the box that could be placed anywhere on the page.
The look is fully customizable on the Edit page.
